transcript: I got lucky I feel like the longer I've been playing the game the more I do believe that luck is a massive contributor to success I was born in America to a family of people that didn't struggle to feed me or give me education I was born bilingual so language and communication came easier to me to know a friend of my own I had two parents who spoke different languages so I think a lot of people discount and they love to be like all right I'm here because I'm so hard ass it's like yeah but if you were born in like Bangladesh as a woman you probably wouldn't be that successful just real it takes a big stretch of positive like yeah we lucked out and if you can watch this from your iPhone you're probably lucky too
